explains: n. 辩护者；护教论者；辨惑学专家（等于 apologete）

sentences.en: Also, Disney was not an apologist for the FBI, as some have suggested.
sentences.cn: 此外，迪士尼并没有像一些人所说的那样为 FBI 辩护。

sentences.en: This article, together with this entire website, is a China apologist forum which dare not to touch actual reality inside China.
sentences.cn: 本篇文章，连同这一整个网站，是一个不敢于触及中国内部实际现实的为中国辩解论坛。
